resources.string: Hi! My name is Cédric Vandelaer and first of all thanks for checking out my app! I\'m a master student computer science at the university of Hasselt (Belgium) and I enjoy reading comics in my free time. I\'m also a big fan of android so I decided to make a comic viewer app in my free time. I wasn\'t really happy with existing apps because of their poor performance, overly complex interfaces or just because I didn\'t like how they looked. Well anyway, have fun reading comics with Comic Viewer!
"Note: the default path \'main storage/ComicViewer\' can\'t be removed"

v2.0
 - Dropbox support
 - Option to choose the file format (Pro)
 - Option to keep the screen on
 - Option to rotate landscape pages in portrait mode
 - Better folder navigation

 v1.3.1
 - Open comics from other apps
 - Changed recents icon
 - Added support for more devices

 v1.3
 - Folder view
 - Increased loading speeds
 - Bugfixes

 v1.2
 - Landscape mode
 - Option to auto fit pages in landscape mode
 - Bugfixes
 - Navigation drawer image loading improvements
 - Ads now only show at the start and the end of a comic

 v1.1.1
 - Added the option to show page numbers for a short time on page change
 - Bugfixes

 v1.1
 - Added additional styling options for the pro version
 - Changed the app drawer image
 - Bugfixes

 v1.0.2
 - Fixed a bug where unrecognized files could not be deleted

 v1.0.1
 - Fixed bug with comics opening slow when loading

 v1
 - Initial release
